bibl.title: Studies on Greek Ostraca from the Theban Region.
bibl.note: 1. The location of the "South-West" district in the Theban region in Graeco-Roman times. - 2. Was there a bank at the Memnonia in the Roman period? - Appendix. List of ostraka which are or can be related to Roman Hermonthis. - 3. Various notes on individual ostraka texts.
bibl.seg: Worp Klaas Anthony, Studies on Greek Ostraca from the Theban Region.

1. The location of the "South-West" district in the Theban region in Graeco-Roman times. - 2. Was there a bank at the Memnonia in the Roman period? - Appendix. List of ostraka which are or can be related to Roman Hermonthis. - 3. Various notes on individual ostraka texts.
